This means conservative leadership is WORKING for our nation, and we want to ensure that New Mexico reaps the full benefits of this economic revitalization!  No more Democratic control of our state.  We need a businessman who understands the dynamics and intricacies of a free market economy.  We need a New Mexico native who has invested his own money into our state, our economy, and our people.   The choice is clear: We need Louie Sanchez for U.S. Senate. SanchezForNewMexico.com 🇺🇸

The flood of illegal immigrants into New Mexico is troublesome in many ways - it affects our education system, our healthcare institutions, as well as our work force and wages.  But perhaps the most critical issue we face are the violent criminals we house without consequence in the name of political posturing.    In some parts of New Mexico, dangerous illegal immigrants are released to the public, after arrest, with no regard for ICE detainers that are legally filed for their detainment.  To be clear, these detainers issued by ICE are not an attempt to round up random illegal immigrants who are just going about their lives... they specifically target illegals who commit CRIMES.  “When does ICE issue detainers? Only when three factors are present: (1) ICE has probable cause to suspect that the person is in the United States illegally, (2) the suspect has been arrested on other charges, and (3) the suspect is in law enforcement custody.”  We must prioritize public safety and the rule of law.  We must protect our citizens first, regardless of political ideology.   As your next Senator, I will work to stop this senseless practice that puts our children at risk.  Please join my fight for New Mexico today.  SanchezForNewMexico.com 🇺🇸

Happy Superbowl Sunday! 🏈 Since today is such an important day in the world of football, I wanted to take the opportunity to talk about our game plan here in New Mexico.  When it comes to getting conservatives elected, we’ve always had an exciting first half.  We pick a candidate, put our time & resources into a great kickoff, and have lots of cheerleaders along the way.  The problem is, we don’t always have a candidate that can score the winning touchdown - and that means we lose.  That’s all going to change in this Senate race against Ben Ray Lujan.   We HAVE his playbook, and we know it well.  Ben Ray will play the race card to make Hispanics think he is the best choice, and he’ll cry “privilege” when his opponent starts winning.   The problem is, HE CAN’T DO THAT AGAINST ME!   I’m a Hispanic man who was raised poor in the South Valley of Albuquerque.  I fought my way to success without the benefit of anything except hard work, and I will do the same for you.   We CAN DEFEAT Ben Ray, New Mexico!  Let’s make it happen together.  SanchezForNewMexico.com

It’s time for a change, New Mexico.  Join me, and let’s create a better tomorrow.  SanchezForNewMexico.com

The crowd last night at the Santa Fe County pre-primary convention was amazing!  I met so many wonderful people, and as always, I thank you for your hospitality.  My points from last night:  • We must choose a Republican candidate who can beat Ben Ray Lujan.  • As someone who was born & raised in a New Mexico trailer park (a fact I’m very proud of, by the way), Ben Ray cannot play the privilege card in an election against me.  He just can’t!  • As a Hispanic, Ben Ray cannot play the race card against me.  Nope!  • As a small business owner, Ben Ray cannot play the “no real-world experience” card against me.  I know what I’m talking about with our taxes and small business issues!  Ben Ray Lujan vs. Louie Sanchez = LEVEL PLAYING FIELD.  We’ve got to get this RIGHT, New Mexico - no more playing for half time.  We’re in this to WIN!!  SanchezForNewMexico.com 🇺🇸

Impressive turnout today at the Roundhouse in Santa Fe!  This legislation (Senate Bill 5) threatens to limit our Constitutional right to bear arms, and I was extremely proud of the number of New Mexicans who showed up and made their voices heard.   I spoke with many of you who strongly oppose Red Flag legislation, and I want you to know that I am fully committed to fighting this.  The probability of laws like this being misused is high, and it’s not a risk we need to take.  “Shall not infringe” means just what it says, and I intend to oppose legislation like this every step of the way.  New Mexico deserves better!  SanchezForNewMexico.com 🇺🇸 #2A

As a sports fan, I am shocked and saddened to hear of the passing of Kobe Bryant and his daughter, Gianna.  As a husband and father, my heart is with his wife and surviving daughters, who are undoubtedly experiencing unfathomable grief.   What a sobering reminder to us that tomorrow is not guaranteed.  Young or old, wealthy or poor, we all leave a legacy to our survivors, and today, I hope you’ll take the time to tell your friends and family how much they mean to you.  Tell them how they’ve inspired you, how they’ve encouraged you, and what you love most about them.  Stand up for what you believe in, and don’t be afraid to share your voice.   To all of my friends, family, and supporters, thank you from the bottom of my heart for being YOU.  I appreciate the love & support you’ve all shown me more than I can say, and I want you to know that YOU are what inspires me each and every day.  SanchezForNewMexico.com 🇺🇸

After a wonderful morning in Las Cruces, Cassie and I hit the road and headed to the World’s Largest Matanza, hosted by the Hispano Chamber of Valencia County.  What an amazing event!   As a native New Mexican and a Hispanic, I have a unique understanding of the sense of community in our culture, and events like this are a true testament to that.  As your next Senator, I will work every day to preserve this way of life for all of us.  Thank you so much for the outpouring of support today, New Mexico!!  SanchezForNewMexico.com

Friends,  Today is Law Enforcement Appreciation Day.  These brave men and women put their lives on the line to protect our communities and keep us safe.  Every morning they leave their house bravely, knowing it could be their last.  As an owner of two firearms stores and ranges, it’s been an honor to have had the opportunity to meet so many law enforcement officers and call them friends. Their courage cannot be overstated, and they have my utmost respect. Unfortunately, Governor Lujan-Grisham has decided to push unconstitutional legislation that the New Mexico Sheriff’s Association opposes.  Just yesterday, she unveiled so-called “red flag” legislation that fundamentally takes away our God-given 2nd Amendment rights.  It’s shameful that our governor would choose to push this agenda during a week when we should be honoring law enforcement officers, not pitting them against our citizens and the United States Constitution. I strongly support our House Republicans in their stand against this proposed legislation, and I will always fight for law-abiding citizens to have our rights to bear arms.  I’m proud to support our heroic law enforcement officers not just today, but every day.  Please join me in honoring them and the immense sacrifices they make for all of us.   God Bless,  Louie

The race is already heating up! Your early encouragement  has been extremely humbling and it's clear that people are tired of political spin. Our nominee needs to fully support the President so that we can be united in November. Period.
Please keep our President, troops, and their families in your prayers tonight. God bless America.

I'm running because as a successful businessman I'm tired of the empty promises from the politicians in DC. It's time to clean up the drugs and crime in our communities and protect jobs for New Mexico. PLEASE WATCH AND SHARE!
